Description:
In next-gen Jira project, there is no option for hiding or archiving projects. It would be great to be able to archive a project that's no longer in use and refer to them in the future.

Also, as a next-gen user I want these archived projects available for viewing for the whole team but through a separate "archived" section.
Creator: Shakiru Ayanloye

Comments.Author: Ankit Goyal
Comments.Comment: Are there any updates on this issue. We need to archive old projects.

Comments.Author: Lizzie Modla
Comments.Comment: Is there any update on this? This would be really useful as our project is getting increasingly cluttered

Comments.Author: Melissa Brady
Comments.Comment: We would also like this functionality.

Comments.Author: Jason Eplawy
Comments.Comment: This is so needed. Priority should be changed to High
